features: STURDY TIGHT-FIT PIECES – This construction kit is designed to fit together snuggly so your marble maze won’t fall apart while you play. With 5 sturdy bases, 15 exciting action pieces, and 45 clear smooth-run track pieces, our kit has countless imaginative configurations.

GLOW IN THE DARK MARBLES – The marble run kit includes 6 different colors of glow in the dark glass marbles that shine bright as they zig-zag down the marble run. Also Includes UV light to quickly recharge the marbles.
CONVENIENT STORAGE – A storage bag and marble pouch make it easy to store your marble run construction pieces and glow in the dark marbles in one place. Makes a great STEM gift for boys and girls!
GREAT STEM TOY – The learning guide inside teaches about the physics of motion and aerodynamics. It also includes marble run construction experiments.

HIGH-QUALITY EDUCATIONAL TOYS - We're proud to make the highest quality hands-on science toys, and all our products are backed by exceptional service. If your experience is less than stellar, let us know and we'll make things right!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: National Geographic 80-Piece Glow-in-the-Dark Marble Run This 80-piece marble run set has everything you need to create incredible marble mazes that will have your glowing marbles racing toward the finish line!

A phenomenal and fun marble run construction activity kit for kids! The National Geographic 80-Piece Glow-in-the-Dark Marble Run Construction Set has everything kids need to create incredible marble runs that will have their glowing marbles racing toward the finish line! This Kit Includes: 15 glow-in-the-dark marbles; 1 UV light to help your marbles glow brighter, longer; 45 smooth-run tube pieces; 15 action pieces that fit securely together, so you can be sure that your marble run maze won’t fall apart when you play; 5 sturdy bases to build a stable structure; storage bag; and Learning Guide with instructions. Configure the pieces in any design you’d like - the possibilities are endless! The detailed learning guide has lots of information about the physics of motion and gravity, so kids can learn while they play! And when they’re all done, a convenient storage bag is included so you can keep all the marble run pieces stored together. The National Geographic 80-Piece Glow-in-the-Dark Marble Run Set is a super-fun way to explore construction, engineering, and physics! Order today! We make the highest quality hands-on science toys, and all products are backed by exceptional service. With a mission to inspire people to care about the planet, the National Geographic Society is one of the world's largest nonprofit scientific and educational organizations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful for imagination
reviews.reviewText: Our grandson is very easily distracted and struggles to focus for long periods of time. This has been a blessing for him. He loves creating new designs and testing them over and over. The pieces are well made and the uv light works quickly on the marbles. The bag that came with it is pretty thin and torn within 2 days of having it. All in all, this was a great purchase and we're loving how much joy he's getting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep my boys busy for hours
reviews.reviewText: The NATIONAL GEOGRAPHIC Glowing Marble Run is a stellar STEM gift for both boys and girls. The 150-piece construction set, complete with 30 glow-in-the-dark glass marbles, has proven to be a captivating building project toy. It keeps my boys immersed for hours, fostering creativity and problem-solving skills. The added bonus of the storage bag ensures easy cleanup. Highly recommend for endless fun and learning!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Sparkly Construction Set
reviews.reviewText: My niece, Vivian (who would shock us all if she didn't become an engineer) spent 4 straight hours creating amazing castles and buildings all so she could light up the marbles in order to make them sparkle and light up the entire building of pieces she made. It was so much fun, versatile, and endless amounts of creativity... All finished of with a but if sparkle ✨ She was ecstatic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality seems great
reviews.reviewText: So far we like the toy however there are three broken marbles that we had to throw away - my son was a bit disappointed; overall seems like a great learning tool and toy for him!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun toy that’s different every time you play with it
reviews.reviewText: Fun to build with 3 yr old granddaughter. The colors are pretty and the plastic is slightly flexible so it’s not quite so easily broken. Making the marbles glow in the dark is a fun little extra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble, Infinite options
reviews.reviewText: Easy Assembly, glow in dark feature is great 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS. IT IS A BIT FLIMSEY, BUT IT HAS HAD MANY HOURS OF USE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My boys absolutely love this thing. I was thinking it was going to be too small for the price. But you get quite a bit for the buck. Definitely a perfect gift for kids!

Awesome value and great quality. This toy is fun for us and our kids! The glowing marbles are pretty cool too. Love having a toy that helps them think/learn/build and keeps them entertained without any electronic component.
Un juego muy bien hecho, didáctico y llegó en el tiempo prometido

reviews.reviewTitle: Viene todo biees lo que necesitaba
reviews.reviewText: Pedí este kit porque se me perdió una pieza y vienen diferentes partes de repuestos

Le cadeau a fait tilt. Pas mal de configurations possibles, les billes phosphorescentes sont jolies dans la nuit. Convient pour une tranche d'âge de 6-11 ans je dirais (mais les plus grands peuvent s'amuser avec aussi).

Ever since I bought this item for my child, he never stopped playing with it. We designed dozens of labyrinths and he really likes experimenting with the different possibilities of the marbles sliding down through the maze.
